title: Lagolago Malumalu Orbital - Auai i le Misiona
heading: Lagolago Malumalu Orbital
vision: I le aso 28 o Novema, 2025 , o le a tatalaina ai le Malumalu o Orbital mai Initia i luga o se roketi ISRO . O se satelite faatufugaga auai auai mai le Global South, o se maa faamanatu i radical inclusion, o se tulaga mo aoaoga, ma se faaosofiaga mo talanoaga i le lalolagi atoa e uiga i le lumanai o le paia i tausaga o tekinolosi, AI ma suʻesuʻega avanoa.

accomplished.heading: Le Mea ua Tatou Faataunuuina
accomplished.content: A maeʻa le fa tausaga o suʻesuʻega ma atinaʻe, ua sauni le misiona. Ua mae'a le atina'eina o masini ma masini komepiuta mo le satelite, pasia su'ega fa'alilolilo aloa'ia e mana'omia mo le fa'amaoniaina o le va'alele, ma fa'amae'a la matou konekarate ma le ISRO. Ua fausia le satelite. E galue le tekinolosi. Ua fa'amālosia i matou mo le fa'alauiloa.

needs.heading: Mea Matou te Manaomia le Lagolago
needs.intro: Ina ia faʻamaeʻaina lenei misiona iloga ma faʻateleina lona aʻafiaga, matou te manaʻomia le lagolago mo vaega taua e lima:

decade.heading: Le Sefulu Tausaga i Luma
decade.intro: O lenei misiona e le muta ia Novema 28, 2025. O lea faatoa amata.
decade.paragraph1: Mo le isi 10 tausaga , o lenei satelite o le a taamilo i le lalolagi, e tali atu i igoa e auina mai i tulimanu uma o le paneta. O le polokalame aʻoaʻoga e faʻamoemoe e aʻoaʻoina le faitau afe o tupulaga i tekonolosi satelite, malepe le Space Gap mo le Global South. O le a oo atu le talafaamaumau i le faitau miliona i le lalolagi atoa, e faaosofia ai talanoaga e uiga i le auai, manatua, ma le paia.
decade.paragraph2: Orbital Temple o loʻo galulue faʻatasi ma Sathi Roy ma le Roy Foundation ina ia faʻaalia lenei vaʻaiga faʻale-aganuʻu e sefulu tausaga. O le Roy Foundation o se faalapotopotoga e leai ni tupe mama e faʻalauteleina le avanoa i aʻoaʻoga faʻaleagaga, faʻamalologa faʻalagona, ma mea faigaluega faʻapitoa mo nuʻu e le o maua i le lalolagi atoa, faʻafesoʻotaʻi le poto anamua ma tekinolosi faʻaonaponei e fausia ai se lalolagi e sili atu ona malamalama, fesoʻotaʻi, ma agaalofa. Faʻatasi, o loʻo matou fausiaina mea tetele e faʻamautinoa ai le avea o le Orbital Temple ma se gaioiga tumau e oʻo atu i nuʻu i le lalolagi atoa.
decade.paragraph3: O lau lagolago e le na'o le fa'atupeina o se fa'alauiloa; e fatuina ai se gaioiga o le a faʻalogo mo le sefulu tausaga ma faʻaosofia ai le isi augatupulaga o tusiata avanoa ma inisinia.

individualDonations.heading: Foai a Tagata Ta'ito'atasi
individualDonations.intro: Auai i le misiona i se tulaga e aoga mo oe. O lagolago ta'ito'atasi o le fa'avae lea o lenei galuega fa'asolopito.

orbitalFriend.title: Uo Orbital
orbitalFriend.benefits: E te mauaina: Igoa i luga ole upegatafa'ilagi le fa'ailoga mamalu · Tusi fa'asinomaga fa'apitoa pe a fa'alauiloa satelite · Fa'afetai fa'afetai fa'aletupe · Lisi e toesea lafoga

satelliteSupporter.title: Lagolago Satelite
satelliteSupporter.benefits: E te mauaina: Fa'amanuiaga uma o le Orbital Friend · Avanoa fa'apitoa satelite e su'e ai le app · Tusitala faafetai savali vitiō · lisiti toese lafoga

spaceAdvocate.title: Avanoa Faufautua
spaceAdvocate.benefits: E te mauaina: Fa'amanuiaga uma a le Satellite Supporter · Lolomi igoa i fa'amaumauga fa'amaumauga · Valaaulia i le su'esu'eina o fa'amaumauga tumaoti · Fa'amatalaga fa'alekuata mai le 'au · Lisi e toesea lafoga.

fundingOpportunities.heading: Fa'atupe se Vaega Fa'apitoa
fundingOpportunities.intro: O lau saofaga e fa'atupe sa'o ai vaega patino o le misiona. Filifili mea e tautala atu ia te oe, pe tuʻufaʻatasia le tele e faʻatupu ai se aafiaga tele.

launch.title: Fa'atupe le Fa'alauiloa Avanoa
launch.description: O le tau faʻalauiloa moni i luga o le ISRO rocket ia Novema 28, 2025 . O lenei mea e auina atu ai le Malumalu o Orbital i totonu o le taamilosaga, lea o le a tumau ai mo le sefulu tausaga o se satelite faatufugaga auai auai ma le malumalu i le lagi, e mafai ona maua e soo se tasi i le lalolagi.
launch.benefits: E te mauaina: "Launch Sponsor" title · Faʻaalia i faʻasalalauga faʻasalalau uma · Faʻailoa pepa faʻasalalau i luga o le mata · Avanoa VIP e faʻalauiloa ai mea e faʻaalia ai mea e fai · Auai i telefoni taʻi kuata ma Edson ma le au a le misiona · Tusi faʻamaonia ma faʻamaumauga satelite faʻasalalau · lisiti toesea lafoga.

travel.title: Fa'atupe le Malaga a le Tusiata i Initia
travel.description: Femalagaiga, fale nofo, ma tau gaosiga mo le tusiata Edson Pavoni ma le vaega autu e molimauina le faʻalauiloaina i Initia ia Novema 28, 2025 . O lenei malaga e taua mo le pueina o pepa, faʻasalalauga faʻasalalau, ma fai ma sui o le Global South i lenei taimi iloga.
travel.benefits: E te mauaina: Fa'afetai patino mai le tusiata · Tuuina atu i tua-le-vaaiga pepa fa'amaumauga · Igoa i fa'amaumauga fa'amaumauga · lisiti toese lafoga

carbon.title: Fa'atupe le Polokalama Fa'afitia Carbon
carbon.description: O le a fa'afitia uma le kaponi, e aofia ai le faʻalauiloaina o roketi ma le fausiaina o le satelite. O loʻo matou galulue faʻatasi ma polokalame faʻamaonia carbon offset e faʻamautinoa ai o lenei misiona e leai se tulaga le lelei o le siosiomaga.
carbon.benefits: E te mauaina: Igoa i luga o le upegatafa'ilagi le fa'ailoga mamalu · Tusi pasi fa'apitoa · Lisi toesea lafoga

education.title: Fa'atupe le Polokalame A'oa'oga
education.description: Atia'e ma fa'alauiloa le a'oa'oga atoa o gagana eseese e a'oa'o ai tupulaga i le lalolagi i Saute i le fauina o satelite. E aofia ai le atinaʻeina o aʻoaʻoga, gaosiga o vitio, faʻasalalauga faʻasalalauga, ma le tausaga muamua o sikolasipi mo tamaiti aʻoga le aoga. Fausia atina'e tumau mo a'oa'oga avanoa.
education.benefits: E te mauaina: "Education Founding Sponsor" aloaia · Sikolasipi i lou igoa · Faʻaalia i mea tau aʻoaʻoga · Faʻafeiloaʻi le vaega muamua o tamaiti aʻoga o loʻo faʻatupeina lau sikolasipi (virtual poʻo le tagata) · Vaega o faʻamaumauga faʻapitoa · Avanoa tautala i faʻasalalauga faʻalauiloa · Lisi e toesea lafoga

docPreProd.title: Fa'atupe le Fa'amaumauga Mu'ai Fa'agaioiga
docPreProd.description: Fa'atupe le vaega muamua o le "O le a le Mea e Faia ai se Malumalu?" talafaamaumau. E aofia ai le faʻatautaia o faʻatalanoaga loloto 2 i Initia ma taʻitaʻi mafaufau ma fomaʻi faʻaleagaga, malaga a le auvaa laiti ma le gaosiga, ma le faʻataʻitaʻia o ata o le muai gaosia. O le vaega lea e fa'amautu ai le fa'avae o le fa'amaumauga ma fa'amaonia le fa'atonuga o le foafoa.
docPreProd.benefits: E te mauaina: Fa'asoa Fa'asoa Fa'asoa · Igoa i fa'amaumauga fa'amaumauga · Su'esu'ega tuma'oti o ata a'o le'i faia fa'ata'ita'iga · Avanoa i tua atu o ata · Lisi e toesea lafoga

docProd.title: Fa'atupe le Gaosiga Fa'amaumauga
docProd.description: Fa'ato'a fa'auma ma fa'auma ona tu'uina atu o le "O le a le mea e fai ai se Malumalu?" , o le tala fa'atusa e su'esu'e ai le va'aiga o faatufugaga, tekonolosi, ma mea pa'ia. E aofia ai le pueina o ata i le tele o atunuu, faʻatalanoaga faʻaopoopo ma taʻitaʻi manatu, faʻataʻitaʻiga atoatoa, faʻavasegaina lanu, mamanu leo, ma suʻesuʻega muamua i Initia ma NYC .
docProd.benefits: E te mauaina: Fa'atagaga Fa'atonu Fa'atonu · Fa'aalia i fa'atagaga amata · Su'esu'ega fa'apitoa mo au malo · Valaulia muamua a le lalolagi (a'ai uma e lua) · To'ai fa'atasi ma Edson ma le fa'atonu o fa'amaumauga a'o le'i faia fa'ata'ita'iga · Avanoa i tua o le vaaiga · Lisi e toesea lafoga

artCollector.title: Avea na'o le Orbital Temple Atleta'i
artCollector.imageAlt: Fa'atuina o le Malumalu Orbital i Mercosul Biennial
artCollector.imageCaption: Orbital Temple i le 13th Mercosul Biennial, Porto Alegre. Ata na saunia e Clara Marques.
artCollector.paragraph1: E tolu satelite tutusa na fausia mo lenei misiona. O le a fa'alauiloa le tasi i le vateatea i le aso 28 o Novema, 2025. E malaga le tasi i fa'aaliga mata'aga i le lalolagi atoa. O le tasi e fa'aagaga mo se tagata aoina limafoai o lo'o mana'o e fa'atupe lenei va'aiga ma maua se vaega o tala fa'asolopito avanoa.
artCollector.paragraph2: E le o se kopi lea; o se tasi lea o uluai satelite e tolu. O se va'a va'alele atoatoa e fai ma fa'atagata . O le satelite e tusa ma le 5cm³ ma le mamafa 245g , ma se faʻailoga e faia i le auro .
artCollector.paragraph4: I le avea ai o le tagata aoina, o le ae mauaina le faʻapipiʻi tutusa na faia mo le 13th Mercosul Biennial , o se faʻaaliga atoa faʻataʻitaʻiga e faʻaalia ai le satelite e pei o ata ma tekinolosi. O lenei fa'apipi'i ua fa'aalia i nofoaga tetele fa'ava-o-malo ma o lo'o fa'atusalia ai le tulaga maualuga o le fa'aaliga o ata avanoa.
artCollector.paragraph5: O lau lagolago e fesoasoani e faʻatupe ai le vaʻaiga atoa: o le faʻalauiloaina, le polokalame aʻoaʻoga, ma le faʻamaumauga o le a faʻaalia ai talanoaga i le lalolagi atoa e uiga i le paia i le vaitau o tekinolosi, AI ma suʻesuʻega avanoa. O lou igoa e feso'ota'i tumau ma lenei misiona iloga.
artCollector.button: Fesili e uiga i Lenei Avanoa

gratitude.heading: Ma le Fa'afetai i O Tatou Lagolago
gratitude.intro: Orbital Temple e mafai ona faia e faʻalapotopotoga, tagata taʻitoʻatasi, ma tagata talitonu i le tuʻufaʻatasia faʻapitoa o loʻo malamalama o faatufugaga e fatuina mafaufauga o taeao.

pearmill.title: Lagolago Faavae
pearmill.description: O le Pearmill o se tasi o ofisa faʻatau maketi sili ona televave i le US, o se vaega o tagata mamanu, maketi, ma inisinia o loʻo galulue faʻatasi e fesoasoani i le faʻatupulaia o nisi o amataga sili ona lauiloa i le lalolagi. O la latou lagolagosua limafoai na mafai ai e le vaega o le Malumalu o Orbital ona faʻatau vaega taua ma atinaʻe meafaigaluega tatala-puna e mafai ai lenei misiona satelite.

gratitude.yourName: Atonu o i'i lou igoa. Auai ma i matou i le fatuina o talafaasolopito.

people.heading: O Tagata i Tua atu o Lenei Misiona
people.intro: Orbital Temple o se tautinoga e 10 tausaga. O loʻo taʻitaʻia e ni tagata se toʻalua ua faʻaalu o la olaga e fesoʻotaʻi ai ata, tekinolosi, ma fesoʻotaʻiga tagata, ma o loʻo fausia ni atinaʻe e faʻatumauina ai lenei vaʻaiga mo le sefulu tausaga oi luma.

edson.name: Edson Pavoni
edson.paragraph1: Edson o se tusiata ma tekinolosi e suʻesuʻe le vavalalata o tagata i le vaeluaga o faatufugaga ma tekinolosi. O lana fa'ata'ita'iga e fa'atatau i mea fa'apipi'i fausaga, solo, ata pue, ma fa'atekonolosi satelite.
edson.paragraph2: O lana galuega na fa'aalia i le 13th Mercosul Biennial (Pasila), IX International Biennale (Uzbekistan), ma le NTU Global Digital Art Prize (Singapore).
edson.paragraph3: Faatasi ai ma le sili atu i le 20 tausaga i le matata o faatufugaga ma tekinolosi , sa ia galulue faatasi ma au fatuga mo le 2016 Rio Olympics ma Inter American Development Bank . Fa'aigoa o se tasi o le 50 sili ona fou fa'apolofesa Pasila e le Proxxima Magazine, na ia mauaina fa'ailoga IF Design Awards (2017-2018) sosoo e lua (2017-2018) ma o le Lumen Prize Futures Award finalist. O lana galuega na faʻaalia i le lua lua tausaga ma tuʻuina atu i le Ludwig Museum of Contemporary Art (Budapest), Inhotim Institute (Pasila), ma le Design and Fashion Museum (Lisbon), faʻatasi ai ma faʻaaliga i Niu Ioka, Beijing, Sigapoa, Dubai, Rio de Janeiro, ma isi taulaga.

sathi.name: Sathi Roy
sathi.role: Fa'avae, Le Roy Foundation & Strategic Partner
sathi.paragraph1: O Sathi o le na faavaeina le Roy Foundation , o se faalapotopotoga e le o ni tupe mama e tuuto atu i le faalauteleina o avanoa i aoaoga faaleagaga, faamalologa faalelagona, ma meafaigaluega malamalama mo nuu le taualoa i le salafa o le lalolagi. O lo'o galulue fa'atasi le fa'avae ma a'oga, fa'alapotopotoga fa'ale-aganu'u, ma fa'alapotopotoga fa'apitonu'u e tufatufa atu meafaigaluega fa'alesoifua maloloina fa'amalosi AI, mataupu a'oa'oga a nu'u, ma fa'asalalauga e fa'aosofia ai suiga.
sathi.paragraph2: Faatasi ai ma se talaaga i le neuroscience, aʻoaʻoga, ma le taʻitaʻiga, ua fausia ma taʻitaʻia e Sathi 'au i Amerika i Matu ma Initia, maua ai le $ 600 miliona i faʻatauga faʻaletausaga i se tasi pisinisi. O ia foi o le faʻavaeina o le OHM , o se faʻagaioiga faʻaleagaga muamua-fuainumera, Co-Founder o SUTE (se faʻatautaia o le ofisa faʻapipiʻi AI), ma galue o se Faufautua ma le Global Head of Growth mo RISE Global Creative .
sathi.paragraph3: I le avea ai o se fafine Bengali-Amerika e faʻafesoʻotaʻi filosofia i Sasaʻe ma Sisifo, ua aumaia e Sathi se vaaiga tulaga ese i gaioiga faaleagaga ma faatufugaga i le 21st seneturi. Faatasi ai ma le tuputupu aʻe o fesoʻotaʻiga o le 65,000+ tagata mulimuli ma sili atu i le 40 miliona faʻamatalaga i luga ole laiga , o loʻo ia fausiaina nuʻu faʻavaomalo e fesoʻotaʻi i vaeluaga faaleaganuu ma faaleagaga.

people.together: Faatasi ai ma le Roy Foundation, o loʻo matou fausiaina se misiona e 10 tausaga e fesoʻotaʻi ai faatufugaga, tekinolosi, aʻoaʻoga, ma le paia, e amata i le faʻalauiloaina o satelite i le aso 28 o Novema, 2025, ma faʻaauau pea i se gaioiga o le a oʻo atu i nuʻu le taualoa i le lalolagi atoa ma faʻamalosia le isi augatupulaga.

join.heading: Auai ia i matou
join.content: Ua fausia le satelite. Ua saunia le tekinolosi. Le aso fa'alauiloa ua fa'atulaga: Novema 28, 2025 . O le taimi lenei e auai ai i se misiona e toe mafaufau i mea e mafai ona faia e faatufugaga, o fea e mafai ona alu i ai, ma po o ai e mafai ona ia tautuaina.

fundSpecific.heading: Fa'atupe se Vaega Fa'apitoa pe Avea ma Paaga Fa'avae
fundSpecific.description: Filifili se tasi o avanoa tau tupe o loʻo i luga, fesili e uiga i le avea ma tagata e aoina ata, pe talanoa i se lagolago masani e fetaui ma lau vaʻaiga.

generalDonation.heading: Fai se Saofaga e Toese Lafoga
generalDonation.description: O sao uma, tetele pe laiti, e lagolagoina le misiona ma e toesea lafoga e ala i la matou lagolago tau tupe, The Field.
generalDonation.button: Foai e ala ile The Field →

taxInfo.heading: Tuuina atu e Toese Lafoga
taxInfo.paragraph1: Orbital Temple o se poloketi faʻatupeina tupe a le Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , o se 501(c)(3) faʻalapotopotoga e leai ni tupe mama e faʻavae i Niu Ioka. O saofaga uma a Amerika e toesea lafoga i le tulaga e faatagaina e le tulafono.
taxInfo.paragraph2:
Le Fanua
75 Maiden Lane, Suite 906
Niu Ioka, NY 10038
thefield.org
taxInfo.paragraph3: Pe a faia ni sao e ala i siaki, faamolemole ia totogi atu i le Performance Zone Inc. faatasi ai ma faamaumauga: "Edson Pavoni: Orbital Temple"
